summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) form used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being interviewed voluntarily as part of an investigation. The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging their understanding and voluntary participation. The specific subject of the investigation is heavily redacted.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The form informs an employee that their participation is voluntary and that no disciplinary action will be taken if they choose not to answer questions.
The subject of the OIG investigation is almost entirely redacted, with only fragmented, unreadable text visible.
The form includes signature lines for an OIG Special Agent and the employee/witness being interviewed.
The document is part of a series, as indicated by the file names EFTA00118779 and EFTA00118780.
